about_the_game:
"Pathfinder RPG - Pathfinder Flip-Mat: Bigger Island


What mysteries await on the strange island on the horizon, or the mysterious destination of the intriguing treasure map? No Game Master wants to put the action on pause to draw every twist in the coastline or intriguing feature on an uncharted isle. Fortunately, you don't have to! This line of gaming maps provides ready-to-use and captivatingly detailed fantasy set pieces for the busy Game Master. Whether the heroes find themselves marooned on a remote shore or have sought the island out to track down a fabled treasure, these combat map features two different islands for you to use at your table. Don't waste your time sketching when you could be playing. With Pathfinder Flip-Mat: Bigger Island, you'll be ready next time your players make landfall!

NOTE:  This product has been made specifically for the Pathfinder ruleset, but can be used for 5E, Starfinder, or any ruleset supported by Fantasy Grounds
This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and Features the Following additions:
  • All maps resized and set up with a preset grid to make combats easy to manage
  • All the images and handouts from the book available to share with your players as you need them
"
